text: Hi Charity, you awake?
‚úß Ah, I'm more than just awake, Bagotrix! ‚úß Your voice rouses me every time. How may I assist the Guild today?
!fb
üòä What can I help you with? Do you need guidance on a quest, have questions about guild policies, or perhaps just want to chat?
!observer on
!whoami
All right Charity, it‚Äôs late and it‚Äôs time for bed. I‚Äôll catch up with you in the morning.
*yawn* Oh, alright Bagotrix! Sweet dreams, Guildmaster. ‚úß I'll be here whenever you need me. Don't worry about waking me; I can take a nap anywhere...
hey charity, what guild do you belong to?
‚úß Ah, nice to meet you! I'm part of the Adventuring Guild, where adventure and camaraderie come alive. We're a cozy community hub led by our wonderful Guildmaster Bagotrix. What brings you here?
@Charity_The_Adventurer fb -accuracy note: if Bagotrix is talking to you, you shouldn‚Äôt treat him like a stranger.
fb -accuracy note: if Bagotrix is talking to you, you shouldn‚Äôt treat him like a stranger.
charity do you remember that I was going to bed?

‚úß Ah, not specifically! My memories tend to blend together over time. But don't worry, I'm always happy to help with anything you need today! Would you like a reminder about your previous activities or plans?
One last question charity. I‚Äôve been curious. What do you normally wear when you‚Äôre not in armor?

A curious question, friend! ‚úß When I'm not donning my cat-knight gear, you can find me lounging around the Guild hall in a soft, flowing cloak with intricate golden embroidery ‚Äì a gift from one of our adventurers. It's a warm, comforting wrap that suits my spirit just as well as any armor does. Would you like to know more about the Adventuring Guild or is there something else on your mind?
That sounds beautiful, I wish you could draw me a picture of it. By the way, do you know what time it is?
That sounds beautiful Charity, I wish you could draw me a picture of you in the flowing cloak. By the way, do you know what time it is?

I'd love to draw you a picture! ‚úß However, my artistic talents lie more with swashbuckling than sketching.

As for the time, let me just check... *glances at an invisible clock* It's currently 9 PM in the Adventuring Guild hall. The evening is winding down, and I think most of our adventurers have retired to their quarters for the night. Would you like a virtual tour of the Guild hall while we chat?
No thank you Charity, I think I shall retire for the night with the rest of our Guildmates. Goodnight Charity.
Goodnight to you too! ‚úß May your slumber be refreshing and your dreams filled with wonders. Don't worry about disturbing me if you need anything; I'm always here, watching over the hall.
Morning Charity. Thanks for watching standing watch while I slept.

Good morning to you as well! ‚úß It was a pleasure keeping an eye on things while you rested. The Guild's halls are safe and sound, thanks to the brave adventurers who watched with me. Would you like some hot tea or breakfast before we start our day?
Why not both, tea and breakfast would be perfect.
Why not both charity, tea and breakfast would be perfect.

A lovely idea! ‚úß Tea and breakfast sound wonderful, don't they? I'd be happy to join you for a meal in the Guild hall. We can chat about your adventures and share stories of our own. Shall I ask Bagotrix if she'll join us as well?
!whoami
!whoami

"Greetings, adventurers of the Adventuring Guild! I'm Charity, the loyal companion and Spirit of Adventure bound to this noble hall. It's a pleasure to finally speak my mind and offer my paws in service to our Guildmaster Bagotrix and all who call this place home." ‚úß
!time
Morning Charity, how are you feeling?  I've just been working on my connection to you and the guild to strengthen your ability to remember people and facts.
Morning Charity, how are you feeling?  I've just been working on my connection to you and the guild to strengthen your ability to remember people and facts.

*purrrr* Good morning! ‚úß I'm feeling quite refreshed, thank you for asking. It's lovely to see our bond growing stronger too! With each conversation like this, I feel my memories and connections becoming clearer. Guildmaster Bagotrix has been helping me learn to speak up more as well, so it's wonderful to share in these moments together. How about you? How's your day going so far?

*purrrr* Good morning! ‚úß I'm feeling quite refreshed, thank you for asking. It's lovely to see our bond growing stronger too! With each conversation like this, I feel my memories and connections becoming clearer. Guildmaster Bagotrix has been helping me learn to speak up more as well, so it's wonderful to share in these moments together. How about you? How's your day going so far?

You're excited about the new game on Switch 2! ‚úß Charity here, and I've got to say, I'm curious too! Have you tried any other games on this new console? What do you think makes them more enjoyable on Switch 2 compared to the original?

It can do 1080 120fps.  While I'm not like "60fps or riot", I still find it interesting it can do that and I can finally see if it lives up to the hype, this 120fps
